title: World

items.description: The park is expected to attract more than eight million annual visitors and open in 2031.

items.title: Thousands of dinosaur footprints found on Italian mountain
items.description: The footprints date back some 210 million years and show traces of toes and claws.

items.title: Who are the victims?
items.description: Authorities say two rabbis, a Holocaust survivor and a 10-year-old girl were among the victims.
